welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schonefeld, Germany! Get ready to be captivated by the city's charming blend of historical sites, modern architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Handles international flights for full-service airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-tegel / Otto Lilienthal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-tegel / Otto Lilienthal Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.
